tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE palm_vein_templates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    template_name VARCHAR(50),
    template_data BLOB
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    palm_template_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (palm_template_id) REFERENCES palm_vein_templates(id)
)

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    access_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE palm_vein_templates (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  template_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES palm_vein_templates(id),
  access_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE access_control (
  user_id INT REFERENCES palm_vein_templates(id),
  access_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE security_users (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  password_hash BYTEA
)
